name: Team6 - G&T On an excellent adventure
name_original: Team6 - G&T On an excellent adventure
description:
How to play:

movement keys - W,A,S,D : up, left, down, right

Reach the end of the level to win and collect points along the way by breaking the boxes with your head, or jumping on the **** logo's.

Try not to let Ted get angry or he'll start taking over the game.

Ted gets angry when he kills enemies, when you kill enemies he wants to kill, when you die and unexpectedly. 

Developers that worked on this game:

909980 Lewis Marlow

918673 Prisha Gellaboina

904798 James Stedall
